miniapp.name: TIP FAV
miniapp.subtitle: Instant Farcaster Tipping
miniapp.description: TIP FAV enables seamless on-chain tipping directly from Farcaster. Tip your favorite creators instantly with ETH or USDC in a truly decentralized way. No intermediaries, just pure value transfer between Farcaster users. Experience the future of social commerce where every tip strengthens the creator economy.
miniapp.ogDescription: Tip your favorite Farcaster creators instantly with ETH or USDC. Decentralized, trustless, and seamless.
